channel.title: What do you prefer to be?
channel.description: I vote for an adult.I can't wait to graduate :cool: It's way better when you're not forced to go everyday on school where you don't want to be with people picking on you and stuff like that. :mad: I'd actually prefer to get a good job and work with mature people.. Atleast you can earn money from jobs -.- What do you guys think?

item.title: What do you prefer to be?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

I have a job that I love.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you prefer to be?

item.title: What do you prefer to be?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Unless your a lucky bastard and everything goes your way and also you have a great job that pays well and you enjoy very much… Well then growing up is a big disappointment.

I can’t stress enough about getting a job you enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you prefer to be?

item.title: What do you prefer to be?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

amfg, i gotz an idea, how boutz we all be kids, but “homeschooled” kids, problem solved, now stfu school h8rs (including myself), school does - biggest waste of time since country music and pop, school 100% should b a place where u pick up papers, go home, do what u want, hand em in the next day or on due date, thats fucking all, no sit in classes and listen to music and go along with w.e is happening and having 4 hours of ur life left to do fawk all cause other people prob didnt finish hw, cause they rn’t smart nuff lol… >.> GF ppl

Read full topic
item.source: What do you prefer to be?

item.title: What do you prefer to be?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Top Poster, post:1, topic:279687”]I’d Rather be a Kid, but then Yet i absoluetley HATE School.

School is a Complete waste of time, when you can Learn on your own.[/quote]

You probably don’t even realize how much you learn from school. You learn the basic subjects, sure, but it goes far beyond that. You learn social skills and mental endurance. You learn problem solving and how to cope in stressful situations. School is a necessity for anyone who wishes to be successful later in life.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you prefer to be?

item.title: What do you prefer to be?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:27, topic:278459”]Those (most) of you who are wishing that you were adults are going to so regret it when that time comes. You are going to be like "wow, when I was a kid, life was so fucking easy. Now life sucks. thinks about time in High School etc, wishes that they did not wish it was over so quickly and instead spent the time to actually enjoy it

It’s gonna happen to you tbh ^[/quote]

Too late, already happens.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you prefer to be?

item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Top Poster, post:1, topic:279687”]I’d Rather be a Kid, but then Yet i absoluetley HATE School.

School is a Complete waste of time, when you can Learn on your own.[/quote]
But these are the best and easiest years of your life; relish them.

item.source: What do you prefer to be?

item.title: What do you prefer to be?
item.dc:creator: @Liquicity Liquicity
item.description:
@Liquicity wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:8, topic:278459"][quote author=Girona link=topic=367537.msg2784262#msg2784262 date=1242396360]

Obviously an adult, school is a complete fucking waste of time.

Yeah, for example why the fuck do I need to know how to graph quadratic equations? It’s a bunch of shit I doubt I will ever use it in the real world. Things need to be taught that are useful for whatever it is you want to do later in life, like things in the medical field, programming, law etc.

I agree school sucks, but it isnt a waste of time.
[/quote]School only exists so you fucking morons can learn.
And you get picked on at school?!

No, it’s a complete fucking waste of time because all they do is teach you shit you already know/don’t give a fuck about.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: What do you prefer to be?

item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Those (most) of you who are wishing that you were adults are going to so regret it when that time comes. You are going to be like "wow, when I was a kid, life was so fucking easy. Now life sucks. thinks about time in High School etc, wishes that they did not wish it was over so quickly and instead spent the time to actually enjoy it

It’s gonna happen to you tbh ^
